H0.text: What item of headwear is associated with Sherlock Holmes. Top Hat

H1.text: What item of headwear is associated with Sherlock Holmes. Newsboy Cap

H2.text: What item of headwear is associated with Sherlock Holmes. Fedora

H3.text: What item of headwear is associated with Sherlock Holmes. Deerstalker

A4.text: The deerstalker is the most typical cap of the period matching both descriptions, not surprisingly, the original illustrations... depicted Holmes as a 'deerstalker man', which then became the popular perception of him.

A5.text: Because of the cap's popular association with the fictional detective Sherlock Holmes, it has become stereotypical headgear for a detective...
